reviewText: This show is a great it shows a child how to protect himself more mentally than physically. The show is not at all targeted to violence as one would think. It's was a great pass time for me when I was a child growing up and I'm glad our son is enjoying this too.Our son is really enjoying these old favorites of ours.Cynthia

reviewText: Since no one bothered to post a review, here is mine.volume one of pr samurai begins with Origins 1 and 2. i was afraid they would of put these eps in a later dvd since they were purposefully aired out of order, but rest assured they are in their proper order. the episodes look amazing! i'm wondering why lionsgate didnt release a bluray release as a combo package thing but whatever, i hear lionsgate will release a full boxset of pr samurai but at a later date. most likely after the series finishes airing.the special features are as follows, original audition tapes for the 5 rangers, ranger swarm video taken at the licensing show back in early 2011 i believe, and how to stay fit videos for each ranger.the main english track is in english 5 dolby digital, and the spanish and french audio tracks both are in 2.0. there are no subtitles, and theres a trailer for power rangers super samurai that aired before the season was aired so thats a nice touch.if your a power ranger fan, please support this release. the dvds look great, and the extra bonuses although small is something we've never gotten from a disney release. so i say its totally worth the purchase!Power Rangers Samurai: The Team Unites (Volume One)
